data.title: The Best Colleges in Guwahati to Secure Your Future Easily!
images: https://rblog.b-cdn.net/_Blue White Modern Marketing Strategy Blog Banner-1710768564.jpg
meta_keywords: best colleges in Guwahati for arts
best colleges in Guwahati for science
data.meta_description: Guwahati's Top 10 Colleges Guaranteed to Get You Hired
data.text:
Guwahati is the quivering city of eye-catching Assam. To provide education, this city has abundant institutes. The colleges of Guwahati are very famous for their scholastic superiority and various programs. Starting from different fields including Arts, Commerce, and Science to Engineering and Medicine, Guwahati colleges offer a wide range of educational courses. Finding the best colleges within the city can be an arduous task. So, here's a list of some of the best colleges in Guwahati with their detailed information.

List of Top 10 Best Colleges in Guwahati

There are numerous colleges available in Guwahati. Some of them are as follows:

1. B.Boorah College

B. Boorah College was established in 1943. There are numerous colleges available in Guwahati. There were numerous courses available at this college. For postgraduates and undergraduates, there are numerous courses available, including Arts, commerce and Science management, information and technology, etc. This college is one of the best colleges in Guwahati for arts.

2. Assam Engineering College

Assam Engineering College is the first engineering college in North-Eastern India. This is considered among the best engineering colleges in Guwahati.

3. Guwahati Medical College and Hospital

Guwahati Medical College and Hospital is located in Bhangagarh, Guwahati, Assam. This is a foremost college pioneered in 1960, designed specifically for students of medicinal sciences. This is one of the best colleges in Guwahati for science.

4. Don Bosco College of Engineering and Technology

Don Bosco College of Engineering and Technology, also known as DBCET, is situated on Airport Road, Azara, Guwahati. This college is associated with Assam Science and Technology University (ASTU). Numerous engineering courses are provided here for undergraduates and postgraduates by this college, including:

Civil Engineering

Mechanical Engineering

Computer Science and Engineering

Electronic Engineering

Communication Engineering

Electrical Engineering

5. Institute of Hotel Management

The Institute of Hotel Management (IHM) is situated in Hengrabari, Guwahati, Assam. This institute educates students to learn in the field of hotel and tourism management. IHM Guwahati's course offerings are encircled with:

BSc in Hospitality Management

MSc in Hospitality Management

Diploma in Food Production

Diploma in Bakery and Confectionery

Food and Beverage Service

6. Handique Girls’ College

Handique Girls’ College is one of the best colleges in Guwahati. It is situated on GNB Road, Dighalipukhuri, Guwahati. Students here are benefitted from scholarships, as this college provides scholarship programs along with quality education.

Courses offered here include:

B.A. in History, Geography, Political Science, English, Hindi, Bengali, Statistics, Education, etc.

B.Sc. in Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology, Home Science, Computer Science and Application.

BCA

M.A. in numerous fields.

M.Sc. in many fields.

7. Dispur College

Dispur College is another college in Guwahati for upper-level education. This college provides many courses like B.A., B.Com., BBA, etc. But, this college is popular as the best BCA college in Guwahati. Courses processed by Dispur College are as follows:

Bachelor of Arts (BA)

Bachelor of Commerce (BCom)

Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)

Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)

8. Arya Vidyapeeth College

Arya Vidyapeeth College is one of the A-rated colleges, which means it is one of the best colleges in Guwahati. It is associated with Gauhati University. This college is popular for maintaining the standard of pedagogy. The courses available for you are:

B.A. in English, Bengali, Education, Geography, History, Political Science, Sanskrit, etc.

B.Sc. in Botany, Chemistry, Geology, Mathematics, Physics, and Zoology.

M.A. in Economics, History, Political Science, Geography, etc.

M.Sc. in numerous fields.

Diploma Courses.

9. Pragjyotish College

One of the well-established colleges in Guwahati, Pragjyotish College was set up in 1954. Over time, it has been labeled as a top college in Guwahati. There are different courses offered at this institute. Some of them include:

Bachelor of Arts (B.A)

Bachelor of Commerce, (B.Com)

Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.)

Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)

Master of Arts (M.A)

Management Tourism Management (MTM)

10. NEF College

NEF College offers varying courses for higher secondary (+2), undergraduate, and postgraduate students based in Guwahati. It is affiliated with Dibrugarh University, the Assam Higher Secondary Education Council, and Gauhati University. NEF College, Guwahati, offers some of the programs offered also at Pragjyotish College. The courses provided by NEF College are:

Bachelor of Arts (B.A)

Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.)

Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)

Bachelor of Social Work (BSW)

Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)

Master of Arts (MA)

Master of Commerce (M.Com.)

Master of Business Administration (MBA)

Master of Social Work (MSW)

The Best Commerce Colleges in Guwahati

If somebody has a keen interest in commerce, they might find it challenging to look for some of the most suitable and well-established means, the best colleges in Guwahati. Not to worry, here is a list:

Gauhati Commerce College

K.C Das Commerce College

Royal Global University (RGU)

Pandu College

Dispur College

The Best Law Colleges in Guwahati

Guwahati is a wide-reaching city. There are numerous putative law colleges in Guwahati. Some of the best colleges in Guwahati for law are:

National Law University and Judicial Academy, Assam (NLUJA)

Gauhati University Law College

The Best MBA Colleges in Guwahati

Some of the best MBA colleges are shortlisted as follows:

Gauhati University

Assam Institute of Management

Royal Global University

List of the Best Colleges of Guwahati with Grades by NAAC

Some of the Best Colleges in Guwahati that are graded best by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) are:

Name of the Colleges Grades Provided by NAAC B. Boorah College A++ Assam Engineering College A++ Guwahati Medical College and Hospital A+ Don Bosco College of Engineering and Technology A++ Institute of Hotel Management A+ Handique Girl's College B Dispur College B Arya Vidyapeeth College A Pragjyotish College B+

Conclusion

Guwahati is a sprawling city located in Assam which is home to some of the best colleges mixing the old and the new in tradition. Cotton University and Gauhati University are two schools that stand out from their peers due to their quality education and ample research avenues. The Don Bosco University as well as the Assam Engineering College excel when it comes to specialized engineering courses and technological subjects respectively while the rest of the schools focus more on developing well-rounded students who can learn from one another.

FAQs

Q.1. Which was the initial college established in Guwahati?

Cotton College was the first college established in Guwahati.

Q.2. How many colleges are there under Gauhati University?

Three hundred and twenty-six (326) colleges in total are affiliated with Gauhati University.

Q.3. How many medical colleges are there in Guwahati?

There are two medical colleges available in Guwahati.
